Storages.getFullPath

Function/Meaning
Get full unified storage name
Type
Method of the Storages class
Syntax
getFullPath(path)
Arguments
path Specifies the storage name to be converted into a full unified storage name.
Return Value
Full unified storage name
Description
Converts the storage name specified by path into a full unified storage name.
Redundant path access (for example, system/flags/../data/ etc.) is all compressed.
If the current media or current folder is not specified, it will be complemented.
Reference
Storages.getPlacedPath
